slide.title: Using the Tidy parser
slide.blurb: Thanks to the tidy parser, no longer do you have to rely on regular expressions to extract content from another HTML document. Rather, you can use a much more maintainable solution!
In the following example (found in the ext/tidy/examples/ directory), I use the tidy parser to extract all of the links from an arbitary HTML document

example.title: Grabbing URLs from an HTML document
